snippet: An S.U.V. went out of control, hurtled across Kings Highway and struck an oncoming vehicle driven by an off-duty police officer.
abstract: New York City Correction Dept Officers Africaque Smith and Tiffany Underwood die after their vehicle veers into oncoming traffic on Kings Highway in Brooklyn and slams into a sport utility vehicle driven by an unidentified off-duty police officer.
lead_paragraph: An S.U.V. went out of control, hurtled across Kings Highway and struck an oncoming vehicle driven by an off-duty police officer.

headline.seo: 2 Correction Officers Killed in Brooklyn Crash
headline.main: 2 Correction Officers Are Killed in Brooklyn Crash
headline.print_headline: 2 Correction Officers Are Killed in Brooklyn Crash
